mcq.statement: In which year was a bomb thrown at Lord Hardinge in Chandi Chowk during his state entry to Delhi?
mcq.one_liner: A bomb was thrown at Lord Hardinge in Chandi Chowk during his state entry to Delhi in **1912**.

suggestions.topic: Calcutta to Delhi Shift / Annulment of Partition (1911)
